data.name: FontDescriptor
desc: describes the characteristics of a font.
For example, this can be used to select a font.

properties.name: Name
desc: specifies the exact name of the font.

properties.name: Height
desc: specifies the height of the font in the measure of the destination.

properties.name: Width
desc: specifies the width of the font in the measure of the destination.

properties.name: StyleName
desc: specifies the style name of the font.

properties.name: Family
desc: specifies the general style of the font.
Use one value out of the constant group com.sun.star.awt.FontFamily.

properties.name: CharSet
desc: specifies the character set which is supported by the font.
Use one value out of the constant group com.sun.star.awt.CharSet.

properties.name: Pitch
desc: specifies the pitch of the font.
Use one value out of the constant group com.sun.star.awt.FontPitch.

properties.name: CharacterWidth
desc: specifies the character width.
Depending on the specified width, a font that supports this width may be selected.
The value is expressed as a percentage.

properties.name: Weight
desc: specifies the thickness of the line.
Depending on the specified weight, a font that supports this thickness may be selected.
The value is expressed as a percentage.

properties.name: Slant
desc: specifies the slant of the font.

properties.name: Underline
desc: specifies the kind of underlining.
Use one value out of the constant group com.sun.star.awt.FontUnderline.

properties.name: Strikeout
desc: specifies the kind of strikeout.
Use one value out of the constant group com.sun.star.awt.FontStrikeout.

properties.name: Orientation
desc: specifies the rotation of the font.
The unit of measure is degrees; 0 is the baseline.

properties.name: Kerning
desc: For requesting, it specifies if there is a kerning table available.
For selecting, it specifies if the kerning table is to be used.

properties.name: WordLineMode
desc: specifies if only words get underlined.
TRUE means that only non-space characters get underlined, FALSE means that the spacing also gets underlined.
This property is only valid if the property com.sun.star.awt.FontDescriptor.Underline is not FontUnderline.NONE.

properties.name: Type
desc: specifies the technology of the font representation.
One or more values out of the constant group com.sun.star.awt.FontType can be combined by an arithmetical or-operation.
